issue.title: [JS] Table and Schema assign implementations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4552](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4552). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It'd be really handy to have a basic `assign` methods on the Table and Schema. I've extracted and cleaned up some internal helper methods I have that does this. PR incoming.

comments.body:
